column1: Table 21. Prisoners under military jurisdiction, by branch of service, 2019 and 2020
Report title: Prisoners in 2020 – Statistical Tables NCJ 302776
Data source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, based on data from the Office of the Under Secretary of Defense for Personnel and Readiness, U.S. Department of Defense, 2019 and 2020
Author: E. Ann Carson, Ph.D., BJS Statistician
Table 21. Prisoners under military jurisdiction, by branch of service, 2019 and 2020
Note: Counts are for December 31 of each year.
a/Includes all prisoners under military jurisdiction, regardless of conviction status or sentence length.
b/Includes prisoners sentenced to more than 1 year under military jurisdiction.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, based on data from the Office of the Under Secretary of Defense for Personnel and Readiness, U.S. Department of Defense, 2019 and 2020.
